mapper.insert: insert into t_disaster_type(name_chs, name_en, create_time, update_time) values (#{nameChs}, #{nameEn}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_disaster_attribute(disaster_type_id, name_chs, name_en, unit, required, create_time, update_time) values (#{disasterTypeId}, #{nameChs},#{nameEn},#{unit},#{required},#{createTime},#{updateTime})

insert into t_disaster_attribute_value(disaster_attr_id, value_chs, value_en, create_time, update_time) values
(#{attrValues.disasterAttributeId}, #{attrValue.valueChs},#{attrValue.valueEn}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, name_chs nameChs, name_en nameEn, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime FROM t_disaster_type
